This is undeniably one of the best animated shows ever produced. I hesitate to call it a childrens show (even though it is), because it should not be lumped  into the same category as the crap that is aired nowadays.
There is continuity between the episodes, there is character progression, there is a rather intricate background story. And watch out for the Illuminati as well.

Noxlux - I agree with you completely, and even though this was one of my favorite shows as a kid, looking back I realize how many cultural/literary references I missed at the time. Classic mythology and Shakespeare references abound in this series.
